item.title: Ditte add a quote by Natalie Babbitt
item.description: "Don't be afraid of death; be afraid of an unlived life. You don't have to live forever, you just have to live." -- Natalie Babbitt

item.title: Ditte add a quote by Natalie Babbitt
item.description: "Like all magnificent things, it's very simple." -- Natalie Babbitt

item.title: Ditte add a quote by Natalie Babbitt
item.description: "Everything's a wheel, turning and turning, never stopping. The frogs is part of it, and the bugs, and the fish, and the wood thrush, too. And people. But never the same ones. Always coming in new, always growing and changing, and always moving on. That's the way it's supposed to be. That's the way it is." -- Natalie Babbitt

item.title: Ditte add a quote by Natalie Babbitt
item.description: "Life's got to be lived, no matter how long or short. You got to take what comes." -- Natalie Babbitt

item.title: Ditte add a quote by Natalie Babbitt
item.description: "dont be afraid of death, be afraid of the unlived life." -- Natalie Babbitt

item.title: Ditte add a quote by Natalie Babbitt
item.description: "Still-there's no use trying to figure why things fall the way they do. Things just are, and fussing don't bring changes." -- Natalie Babbitt
